message: anyone knows how far I must read before I watch the first episode?
I always wanted to read the books, and thought this might be a good time to start (read some chapters, watch a episode, repeat)
actually, maybe I should do it the other way: watch the episodes first, then read the books to get all the details...
Personally I'd say read the books first, if you're planning to anyway. You'll be ahead of the episodes in no time.
I wouldn't bother trying to match up books by episodes, that seems more a headache than its worth - and the very structure of the books will probably thwart any attempts anyway.
yeah, I'll just read when I want to read and watch the episodes when they're available
